subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets first baseman, Ike Davis, is batting .162 with only five home runs. A former first-round pick, he is dealing with failure for the first time as a major leaguer.
snippet: The Mets first baseman, Ike Davis, is batting .162 with only five home runs. A former first-round pick, he is dealing with failure for the first time as a major leaguer.
